jordie no this is the command that helped me if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { String text = command.substring(5); yell("["+playerName+"]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

item.title: ~~Yell Command not working!~~
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

ihackgames:

heyy um how i get it so say mod me owner me or admin me that command u gave him worked for me

Wait a second i’ll make one now…

[code] if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5)
{

command.substring(5).replaceAll(“no-ip”, “imgay”);
command.substring(5).replaceAll(“servegame”, “imgay”);
command.substring(5).trim();
if(muted == 1)
sendMessage(“You cannot yell because you’re muted.”);
} else {
if (playerRights == 0) {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5);
} else {
if (playerRights == 1) {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “[Moderator]” +playerName+":" +command.substring(5);
} else {
if (playerRights == 2) {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “[Administrator]” +playerName+":" +command.substring(5);
} else {
if (playerRights == 3) {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “[Owner]” +playerName+":" +command.substring(5);
}
}
}
}
}[/code]
Yes I know, overuse of conventions, but ohwell.

Read full topic

item.title: ~~Yell Command not working!~~
item.dc:creator: @mynameisfrank mynameisfrank
item.description:
@mynameisfrank wrote:

[quote author=magma link=topic=299582.msg2405480#msg2405480 date=1219697658]
It should work, but just to simplify things try this instead:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && (command.length() > 5)) {

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " - "+ command.substring(5);
	
}

Just do that it should work alot better now…

item.title: ~~Yell Command not working!~~
item.dc:creator: @killer_2008 killer_2008
item.description:
@killer_2008 wrote:

Why is my yell command aint working i put it it doesnt give me any errors but when i do ::yell (something here) it doesnt show it to all players it doesnt do anything this is my code

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {

        command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).replaceAll(".smf", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).trim();

        if (muted == 1) {
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
               } else {
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " - "
                    + command.substring(5);
}

}[/code]

Read full topic
